      • reactForResult

        private boolean reactForResult(boolean exceptionFromModel,
                               boolean connection)
        Method reacts for result (answer for command ADD or SUB) sent by server (ends connection with the server or sends command DATA).
        Parameters:
        exceptionFromModel - represents information about status of model exception (true - thrown, false - not thrown)
        connection - represents information about status of flow control flag before reading the results form server
        Returns:
        information about status of flow control flag after reading the results from server

      • prepareDataToSend

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> prepareDataToSend(java.util.List<java.lang.String> dataFromUserList,
                                                                           java.util.Scanner scanner,
                                                                           View view,
                                                                           boolean beforeSendFirstData)
        Method gets data (numbers and sign to calculation) from user if it is necessary (wrong input data from command line) and prepares them to send.
        Parameters:
        dataFromUserList - represents parameters from command line
        scanner - represents variable for downloading data from the user
        view - represents variable form showing information to the user
        beforeSendFirstData - represents information which time data form the user are preparing to send
        Returns:
        dataToCalculationMap with data to calculation

        Parameters:

        dataFromUserList - represents list with data form the user
        Returns:
        information about status of the singFound flag (true - sign found, false - sign not found)
